name: Phaser Dream (Prototype)
description:
Dev : Kejyn#2181 (Discord)

  • Rules :
    The player in order to gain score points has to kill other players by pushing them into the red laser things :D
  • Controls :
    ZQSD = Movements (sorry qwerty players :<)
    Left clic = Primary fire (push player, projectile shot)
    Right clic = Secondary fire (Stun the targeted player, hitscan)
    Space = Jump

  • Points : 
    Die without being touched by another player = -3 points
    Die "normaly" = -1 point
    Killing a player = +2 points

It's not finished, it's only an early prototype in order to track the progress i made and in an attempt to get feedbacks !
